alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lafayette; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 9:51PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lafayette, western Union and Columbia Counties, Webster, west central Caddo, Claiborne and northern Bossier Parishes through 1030 PM CDT... At 951 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stamps to 6 miles south of Bradley to near Belcher. Movement was northeast at 85 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Minden, Magnolia, Springhill, Homer, Stamps, Waldo, McNeil, Blanchard, Haynesville, Benton, Cullen, Plain Dealing, Cotton Valley, Sarepta, Taylor, Emerson, Buckner, Belcher, Shongaloo and Smithland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Arkansas...and northwestern Louisiana.
